summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3436 for the improvement of The Alley in Block Thirteen (13), University Park Addition, being the alley between 17th Avenue Northeast and 18th Avenue Northeast, from East 47th Street to East 50th Street, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 42633, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
